title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Lithuania 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth compared to previous year, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2024 to 2017.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2014.
gold: The statistic shows the growth in real GDP in Lithuania from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 . In 2018 , Lithuania 's real gross domestic product grew by around 3.49 percent compared to the previous year .
